mapper.select: select S.useStar, S.id, M.nickName, M.grade, F.fileName, C.balance, F.cardName from starHistory S inner join member M on S.id = M.id join membercard C on S.cardNum = C.cardNum join cardfile F on C.cardName = f.cardname where M.id = 'customer02'
mapper.update: update member set phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, nickname=#{nickname} where id=#{id}
update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
